summary: Spacecraft operations enthusiast recently completed a dual-degree M.Sc. majoring in Avionics & Human Spaceflight (Oct 2025), with hands-on control-room experience as Head of MCC during the ASCLEPIOS analog mission. Proficient in XTCE, and CCSDS-based telemetry and telecommand systems, with practical exposure to real-time trending, FOP execution, and anomaly response.
